title: Can I Get 1 Blue Essence????
body:
I just got 2 champ shards and I wanted to craft Varus permanently, he's a marksman I wanted to buy for a while since I like playing him mid. I disenchanted my Xayah shard and it turns out I had 579 blue essence and no way to get 1.

Could I get 1 blue essence just for this shard? Thanks!

replies.body: I've heard stories of helper poros that get so excited over Poro Artwork that they leave little the artist gifts of blue essence. Shoot me some artwork of a poro, and you might get lucky. Y'never know till ya try right? ^_^

I'll test my luck but I'm bad at art  >_<

http://imgur.com/vNbOd4M
Every poro is a pretty poro xD! Double check to see if you have enough essence now ^_^!
